author: jdcasey
msg: o New integration test to check that parent poms of dependency poms are resolved.

author: jdcasey
msg: Added test for binary resource with non-standard encoding...I'm trying to get a multi-byte character encoding so it might throw off a String-based copy...

author: jdcasey
msg: o Changed fileCopy process to use byte arrays and ByteArrayOutputStream rather than String/StringBuffer to accommodate binary [test] resources.

author: evenisse
msg: Make the script resilient to changes in the classworlds JAR. It works ONLY if M2_HOME doesn't contains spaces.
If we use double quote around %M2_HOME%\\core\\boot\\classworlds-*.jar for classpath, '*' isn't interpreted by dos.
